articles.title: About me
articles.description: My name is Hanna and I'm studying Psychology at the University of Basel. I'm currently working on my master thesis about e-negotiations. The third semester is all about extraction of the 50 included studies in the scoping review as well as working with the data from the survey - see Home.

articles.title: Welcome to Hannas Website
articles.description: The next graphic shows the main result of my masters survey. Until now, there are only few participants in it.
articles.contents:
first survey resultsHere you can see a profile of face-to-face negotiations and e-negotiations. Participants were asked about their personal experiences with negotiations in the two contexts (ftf vs.Â e-). The final goal is to create different profiles of negotiations and to discover possible trends in an explorative way.

This graphic shows what the content of the e-negotiation was. Most e-negotiations were about the employment contract of the survey participants themselves.

In contrast to the e-negotiation context, the content that was negotiated most in face to face negotiations was buying a service

Further you can see which medium is used most by e-negotiators.
At this point I wanna thank Antony Berbert, who supported me with the creation of this website.
Here you can visit his website: https://antonyberbert.github.io/RTraining/
If you read all this, thanks and enjoy this beautiful sunset picture of Basel :)
Basel
